description: Deep Agro is an innovative company that leverages artificial intelligence to address agricultural challenges, particularly in weed control. Founded in 2017, it aims to optimize the use of agrochemicals, reducing waste and environmental impact. By developing advanced technologies and algorithms, Deep Agro enables targeted herbicide applications, significantly improving efficiency for farmers. With a focus on sustainability, the company is expanding its solutions to various crops and markets, striving to revolutionize agricultural practices globally.
name: Deep Agro
